pattern.title: Base type of complex type with complex content must have complex content

rule.context: xs:complexType/xs:complexContent/xs:*[ (self::xs:extension or self::xs:restriction) and (some $base-qname in resolve-QName(@base, .) satisfies namespace-uri-from-QName($base-qname) = nf:get-target-namespace(.))]
rule.assert: Rule 9-12: The base type of a complex type with complex content MUST have complex content.
